original_text: Have pity upon me, have pity upon me, O ye my friends; for the hand of God hath touched me.
korean_text: 나의 친구야 너희는 나를 불쌍히 여겨다오 나를 불쌍히 여겨다오 하나님의 손이 나를 치셨구나

sentences.original_text: Have pity upon me, have pity upon me
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 불쌍히 여기소서, 나를 불쌍히 여기소서

sentences.original_text: for the hand of God hath touched me
